thread.title: ‘Jump Around’ rapper to celebrate 25th anniversary of classic song | Page Six
thread.title_full: ‘Jump Around’ rapper to celebrate 25th anniversary of classic song | Page Six

author: Ian Mohr
title: ‘Jump Around’ rapper to celebrate 25th anniversary of classic song | Page Six
text:
Everlast — the rapper behind the 1992 House of Pain rap tune (and perpetual sports-arena staple) “Jump Around” — will celebrate the 25th anniversary of his song in New York.
The classic video for the hit was filmed at New York’s St. Patrick’s Day parade, and Everlast will perform Thursday , the night before St. Paddy’s Day, at Irving Plaza.
For the holiday itself, we hear he’ll head to Sweet Chick — the Nas-backed Brooklyn chicken-and-waffles joint — to make the eatery’s signature dish (with Guinness, of course) with the owner, John Seymour. We hear Everlast will wear the same Celtics jersey he donned in the music video.
Warning: Explicit language in video below
